sourcesContent:
const Theme = {

    // Colors
    baseColor: "#428513",
    accentColor: "#006A00",
    alternativeColor: "#2F6500",

    primaryButtonBorder: "#e8b940",
    primaryButtonBackground: "#fed40b",
    primaryButtonBackgroundHover: "#daaf2d",
    primaryButtonButtomColor: "#daaf2d",

    alternateButtonBorder: "#929494",
    alternateButtonBackroundTransition: "",
    alternateButtonBackground: "#d1d5d5",
    alternateButtonButtomColor: "#929494",

    alternateBackground: "#edf0f0",
    primaryBackground: "#ffffff",
    textColor: "#2e3030", 
    linkColor: "#003d8e",

    // Text
    fontFamilyText: "museo_sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif",
    fontFamilyHeading: "'museo_sans', Arial, sans-serif",

 

}

export default Theme;
